snippet.title: Unmirrors gameplay trailer
snippet.description:
It’s bad luck enough for mirrors to break, but what if they could malfunction?
When mirrors start reflecting your fears, your dreams, your awkward memories, there’s only one professional that’ll help you.
Find the similarities between two completely different images in this reverse spot-the-differences game.
Play the demo now on: https://davidtmarchand.itch.io/desespejos
